name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with bacon, eggs, and cheese.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry bacon. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Spicy Indian chicken dish in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken. Grill. Simmer in tomato sauce.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Roll out dough. Spread tomato sauce. Add cheese and basil. Bake in oven.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Comforting Russian dish with tender beef in a creamy mushroom sauce.
instructions: Cook beef. Saute mushrooms and onions. Add sour cream. Serve over noodles.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Classic salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing. Add croutons and cheese. Serve chilled.

name: Sushi Rolls
description: Japanese delicacy made with seasoned rice, seafood, and vegetables wrapped in seaweed.
instructions: Spread rice on nori. Add filling. Roll tightly. Slice and serve with soy sauce.

name: Tacos
description: Mexican street food consisting of a corn or wheat tortilla filled with various meats, vegetables, and toppings.
instructions: Cook meat. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with desired toppings.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Hearty Italian pasta dish with a rich tomato-based meat sauce.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Brown beef. Saute onions and garlic. Simmer with tomatoes. Serve over pasta.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy pasta dish with grilled chicken and Alfredo sauce.
instructions: Cook pasta. Grill chicken. Heat cream and cheese. Combine all ingredients.

name: Beef Wellington
description: Elegant British dish with tender beef wrapped in puff pastry.
instructions: Wrap beef in mushrooms and prosciutto. Cover with puff pastry. Bake until golden.
